text: Dick Liu Kai-chi (; 30 September 1953 â€“ 28 March 2021) was a Hong Kong actor. He was known for his roles in Cageman and Beast Stalker, which won him Best Supporting Actor at the Hong Kong Film Awards twice. He began his career in 1979. He died in Hong Kong on 28 March 2021 from stomach cancer, aged 67. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Hong Kong Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Hong Kong actors Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese television actors
title: Liu Kai-chi
